_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PANEL
name: Always Auth
author: contact@quacks.media

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -e

echo "======================================"
echo " AlwaysAuth Installer"
echo "======================================"

# -----------------------------
# Configuration
# -----------------------------

DOWNLOAD_URL="https://github.com/GamerDuck123/AlwaysAuth/releases/download/v0.4.2/AlwaysAuth-standalone-0.4.2.jar"
JAR_NAME="AlwaysAuth.jar"

# -----------------------------
# Environment
# -----------------------------

INSTALL_DIR="/mnt/server"
cd "$INSTALL_DIR"

echo "Install directory: $INSTALL_DIR"

# -----------------------------
# Dependencies
# -----------------------------

echo "Checking required tools..."

command -v curl >/dev/null 2>&1 || {
    echo "ERROR: curl is not installed."
    exit 1
}

# -----------------------------
# Download
# -----------------------------

echo "Downloading AlwaysAuth..."
curl -L "$DOWNLOAD_URL" -o "$JAR_NAME"

# -----------------------------
# Validation
# -----------------------------

if [[ ! -f "$JAR_NAME" ]]; then
    echo "ERROR: Download failed, jar not found."
    exit 1
fi

# -----------------------------
# Post-install
# -----------------------------

echo "Install completed successfully!"
echo "Jar: $JAR_NAME"
echo "======================================"
